title: UI Guideline

title: Twon - Project down for maintenance

title: On Time Solution Corp
body: Crafted a responsive and engaging company website using Astro and Sass, dramatically boosting customer interaction. This strategic update propelled weekly customer calls from a mere 2-5 to an impressive 15-25, marking a significant leap in business engagement and overall market visibility.

title: Master Appliance Tampa
body: Revitalized an online presence with a bespoke website, enhancing customer acquisition by 80% through strategic design and development.
